about_the_game:
A warm, cozy night in a winter Cabin, sound of wood logs crackling in the furnace,
Perfect night to talk about scary winter stories with your friends.

Close the doors and shutdown the windows

There is something outside . . .



SURVIVE THE NIGHT

A new Co-op Multiplayer Survival-Horror
Brand new multiplayer survival horror experience,
featuring the thrill of an ordinary night out in a Cabin with your friends that quickly turns into a horror folktale,
Invite your friends or play solo, either way, be wary of what awaits outside!

NEW GAMEPLAY MECHANIC TO CELEBRATE NEW YEAR'S EVE:

Cold Exposure;

  • Unpredictable
    The cryptid will learn of your behavior and will improve new strategies based on locational knowledge.
    You may find something else camping in your favorite spot.
    Sometimes it may just scare you, although it might even try to flank you if it gets angry for whatever reason.
  • Singleplayer & Multiplayer
    Different challenges await the solo and co-op players.
    In any case, the more you survive the more aggressive the difficulty will get.
  • Locational Voice Chat
    It will be easier for your friends to know your location when you are talking on voice chat.
    Be careful though, your voice may be heard by something else instead.
  • Smooth Gameplay
    No complicated tasks and chores.
    Very easy to get into and to get scared.
  • Face one of the most hideous cryptids
    The first phase will make you face an extremely agile beast that was once a humble Lumberer, now a Northern Cryptid of winter folktales (no spoilers here!)

Photosensitivity Warning

A small percentage of people may experience seizures when exposed to certain lights, images or patterns, even with no history of epilepsy or seizures. This game may contain such visuals. Player discretion is advised.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Implicit Violence

name: HIDEAWAY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or New-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or New-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: HIDEAWAY is an online co-op survival-horror game in which you and your friends are staying the night in a winter Cabin and there is something outside, waiting for you to come out.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
